thread.title: Device thrown in Kosovo parliament, filling chamber with smoke

title: Device thrown in Kosovo parliament, filling chamber with smoke
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
BELGRADE (Reuters) - An opposition lawmaker in Kosovo threw a device in parliament on Thursday, filling the chamber with smoke, Kosovo media...
